thread.title: Wonderful stay in the center of NYC
thread.title_full: Wonderful stay in the center of NYC - Review of Millennium Broadway New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: dschils
title: Wonderful stay in the center of NYC
text:
Thank to the wonderful team of the hotel. It's making your stay even more enjoyable.
Rooms are nice, cleaned perfectly each day and the food is excellent (breakfast or dinner). Good coktails at the bar.
Special thanks to SYED from the reception desk !
Room Tip: With view on Time Square, it's so nice !! See more room tips
